page.title: 10Brixington Blues
page.content: On Tuesday at 5.45 I go to { {Brixington Blues.}We pay 30p each week and one pound every year for membership.We start by warming up and then have a practice match.The people who help out are Mr Trail, Mr Haysom, Mr Starr and Mr Payne. In the summer we play at school and in the winter we play at the Marine camp at Lympstone. Jeff tells us which matches we will be playing and who will be in the team. We have an A and B team. Every season we have a{presentation} at the{Farmhouse Inn.}There is a disco and players receive medals. Also there is a raffle . The money raised is used to buy gear. Last season Brixington Blues got into three finals and won them all.
